results.title: Does atenolol differ from other beta-adrenergic blockers?
results.text_hl: This re-analysis showed 13 % fewer @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarctions@@@ among @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ treated with non-@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ beta-adrenergic blockers than among @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Aursnes I, Osnes JB, Tvete IF, Gåsemyr J, Natvig B. Does atenolol differ from other beta-adrenergic blockers? BMC Clin Pharmacol. 2007 May 8;7():4. PMID: 17488499

results.title: Anti-anginal effect of Tenormin (atenolol).
results.text_hl: It has been observed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ significantly decreases the weekly number of @<m>DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@anginal attacks@@@, and the amount of sublingual @CHEMICAL_Nitroglycerin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005996 @@@nitroglycerin@@@ consumption.
